About Me

Let me introduce myself

BIO

My interest in creating things started WAY back in the good ol' days of MySpace. Back then, you added basic HTML and embed a music player and you were gold! Then, in 2011, I was hired to maintain a website for a nonprofit I worked for. There, my interest for creating functional websites began! Fast-forward to 2017, I knew I needed to pursue an education regarding web development. I started with FreeCodeCamp, CodeCademy, and other options, learning how to write, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I started creating more and more projects from there. My current target is building accessible services and experiences for various clientele
